game.name: Fickle Card Legend
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A side-scrolling, non-turn-based card battle game. Level up, collect gear, and challenge stages and bosses with a unique card-clash combat system. Designed for the '80s generation who are tired of modern generic titles. No AFK, no easy wins. New-gen players, choose wisely.
